description: This Dart file defines a HabitProvider class that manages the state and operations related to habits in a Flutter application. It provides methods for setting, adding, updating, and removing habits, and notifies listeners on state changes.

classes.name: HabitProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that manages habit data and provides methods for habit operations.

methods.name: setHabits
methods.description: Replaces the current list of habits with a new list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addHabit
methods.description: Adds a new habit to the list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateHabit
methods.description: Updates an existing habit identified by id and notifies listeners.

methods.name: removeHabit
methods.description: Removes a habit by id and notifies listeners.
